title: Feature Request: add path parameter for HTTP connections, or allow path in the hostname/IP  parameter e.g. 127.0.0.1:9000/admin
author: SimplifyAndAddCoffee
body_snippet: I would like to be able to store more web admin panels in my connections, but many of them have paths in the URL that I cannot access. e.g. pi.hole:81/admin etc. Hopefully it should be relatively easy to add support for this?
